javadoc: Plugin event generated when the highlight in a program changes.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: src
params.comment: name of the plugin that generated the event

params.name: hl
params.comment: Program selection containing the selected address set.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the program selection contained in this event.
@return ProgramSelection contained in this event.
methods.name: getHighlight
methods.comment: Returns the program selection contained in this event.

methods.javadoc: Returns the Program object that the highlight refers to.
methods.name: getProgram
methods.comment: Returns the Program object that the highlight refers to.
